name: Wild Duck Sniper
description:
Duck life is hard! Duck life is short! Become an ultimate duck hunter! It this awesome free game you can snipe birds without going to the wild! 3D environment looks so real you can feel the feather flying!

Features:
- Absolutely allowed to play
- 3d lovely shooting condition
- Easy and smooth controls
- Console quality HD illustrations
- Realistic sounds
- A consistent with life chasing knowledge.
- High Definition illustrations.
